data.description:
THIS IS A BETA VERSION, FEATURES ARE STILL WORK IN PROGRESS.

PadelVR is a sport simulator in which you'll be able to learn, train and play Padel.

What you will find in the Beta for free:

▪ A Custom Crafted Physics Engine: Ball Compression, Air Friction Effects,
Great Racket-Ball Collision and Directional control. (Under Development).

▪ Freeplay mode: try serving and hitting the ball alone on the court.

▪ Warm Up: a coach will throw random types of balls at you based on your position.

▪ Pass the Ball: get your blood pumping with a simple AI that returns your balls.

We also have unlockable content package for 3$ which includes: 

▪ Minigames: 10 minigames to test your skills:
Dejadas, Bandejas, Lobs, Bajadas de Pared, Bajadas Mix, Boleas, Brick Destruction and BASIC AI BOT CHALLENGE. 
We'll be updating the Minigames in the next few months. 

▪ Extra Stadiums.

Note you have a physics tab where you can edit in game physics to tune your preferences like Bounciness, Surface Friction, Air Friction, Ball Compression and Springiness... 
(WARNING: Changing the physics values may break configured shots, a reset button is available to set values to default ones).

Finally you can buy right now our NEW PADEL RACKET ADAPTER for Quest2 Controllers (Quest3 will come soon),
to maximize the realism of your PadelVR experience.

Join our Discord Channel and give us your feedback!

changelog.change_log:
Performance improvements
Fixed error for opponent position in dropshots minigame
Graphics menu added, MSAA is now enabled by default but can be turned off there
Fixed issue with top scoreboard in End court shots game
Fixed issue with target moving too soon in end court shots game
Diagonally opposite target moved closer to the centre in Bajadas mix game to avoid aiming at the fence
Text updates including multiple language fixes
Opponent FX added to end court shots game
Bandejas game now allows the ball to bounce once
Fixed issue in games 1 and 2 player does not get moved to left hand side if chosen during the game
Fixed issue in lobs game where selecting left hand side does not move player left mid game
Fixed issue in bandejas game where moving right puts you in the wrong position
Fixed issue in volleys game with player position
Other minor fixes
